clinical_history: Patient with history of known malignancy referred for staging PET-CT.
findings: Focal hypermetabolic activity noted in mediastinal lymph nodes with SUVmax 6.99.
Physiologic brown fat uptake in supraclavicular region.
Hypermetabolic lymph nodes noted in mediastinal lymph nodes, suggestive of malignancy.
Mild inflammatory uptake in mediastinal lymph nodes region.
No abnormal activity in lungs or mediastinum.
recommendations: Clinical correlation recommended with prior imaging.
